ygData.subject: No Drop
ygData.msgSnippet: Dest, I fell your pain as I am sure many do.  We need to start a Feedback campaign asking them to at least make it so the bank can hold our No Drop items.  Its
ygData.messageBody:
Dest,

I fell your pain as I am sure many do. We need to start a Feedback campaign
asking them to at least make it so the bank can hold our No Drop items. Its
not like someone can take it out of there and I am sure it is not a huge
amount of code that would need to be adjusted.

Please send a feedback, not a petition, requesting that our banks be able to
hold the No Drop items.

Thanks.

Scott

-----Original Message-----
From: Dest [mailto:dragon@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 7:43 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Looting LORE items

From: "Dest" <dragon@...>

LORE doesn't mean no drop no trade

Lore mean u can only have one of such item in your poession you can still
drop and trade them as is the case for BBC which is Lore

if a item is no drop no trade most would say so...
exceptions: Paladins testimony of truth, H.K 102 key in soulfire quest

Dest

P.S. I HATE CARRYING THEM WITH ME!!!!!!!! AAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH
